title: Ketu Transit in the 3rd House for Aries Ascendant
summary: Ketu transiting your 3rd house brings detachment from constant activity, communication, and ego-driven effort. This phase reduces the urge to prove courage or dominate through action, shifting focus toward selective and purposeful expression. Initiative becomes inwardly guided rather than reactive. Relationships with siblings and peers may feel distant or minimal, while mental energy turns introspective. Ketu here favors silent strength, skill refinement, and mindful action over noise and visibility, demanding patience and consistency rather than impulsive effort.

sections.heading: Communication & Expression
points: Less interest in debates or persuasion
Silence carries greater impact than words

sections.heading: Siblings & Peer Relations
points: Emotional distance with siblings or cousins

sections.heading: Skills & Learning
points: Interest in solitary or technical learning

closing: Ketu in the 3rd house refines effort through restraint. Purposeful action and inner courage replace noise-driven ambition.
